input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h3: All in. Every Child, Every Day, Whatever It Takes!

img.alt: Per orders from the Governor, District Three will remain closed for the remainder of the 2020-2021 school year. We are making it a priority to hold as many events for seniors as we can. Our Superintendent is committed to holding events like graduation. Instruction is continuing. Your student's school will be in touch on how to get assignments. Meal delivery will also continue. District Three delivers five days of meals on three different delivery days. If you need to be added to this delivery list, please contact your student's school. As always, if you have any questions, we are here and working for you. Please feel free to reach out to your student's school or the District Office at 279-6000.

div.span: District Three is starting a collection of food, gift cards, cleaning and hygiene supplies for our families in need. The goal is to collect enough items to help these families on a weekly basis into the summer months!

img.title: We are making it a priority to hold as many events for seniors as we can. Our Superintendent is committed to holding events like graduation. Instruction is continuing. Your student's school will be in touch on how to get assignments. Meal delivery will
img.alt: Spartanburg School District Three to remain closed for remainder of 2019-2020 school year

div.h3: Spartanburg School District Three to remain closed for remainder of 2019-2020 school year
div.span: Per Governor McMaster's orders, all school districts in South Carolina will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

img.title: senior night Senior athletes! Make sure to join us Wednesday night at the Broome student parking lot for our Senior Night for athletic recognition. All students should remain in their cars! Please contact Coach Fleming if you have any questions.

span.style: font-family: inherit; background-color: #ffffff; color: #1c1e21; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: Senior athletes! Make sure to join us Wednesday night (4/22) at the Broome student parking lot for our Senior Night for athletic recognition. All students should remain in their cars!

div.span: For those struggling with Internet access during this time, District Three will be using four of its buses as mobile hot spots. There will be Wifi with a 300-400 foot range on each bus.

img.title: click here for a list of helpful resources
img.alt: Looking for help during the school closure?

div.h3: Looking for help during the school closure?
div.span: Here are a list of resources during the closure to help you during this time.

img.title: grab n go meal details
img.alt: Do you need food during the closure?

div.h3: Do you need food during the closure?
div.span: If you need meals, please make sure your child's school knows. We are continuing to have families signing up daily so thank you for your patience during this process!

img.title: d3 message
img.alt: A Message to our D3 Community Members

div.h3: A Message to our D3 Community Members
div.span: arents, students and community members, please take a moment to hear from our D3 leaders about what's happening during these next few days.
